contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentLabel: Customize Xperience by Kentico UI – Channel specific settings
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentShortDescription: Xperience by Kentico's Settings application is not open to customization for developers, so where can they store custom configuration and settings for each channel in their solution? Dragoljub Ilic gives a detailed explanation of the challenge and his solution using Xperience's administration customization.
